Question: What significant event occurs involving Raju Malhotra in the A-section?
Options:
A. Raju Malhotra fails his exams
B. Raju Malhotra becomes the top student
C. Raju Malhotra falls for a girl in the A-section
D. Raju Malhotra gets expelled
Answer: Raju Malhotra falls for a girl in the A-section
